feed.title: Google Cloud: Service Usage
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Service Usage

entry.content: Service Usage support for Hierarchical Service Activation is available in Preview. This feature lets you enable and disable services across your organization's resource hierarchy.
entry.summary: Service Usage now supports Hierarchical Service Activation in Preview. This feature allows you to enable and disable services across your organization's resource hierarchy.
entry.title: Feature: Hierarchical Service Activation
